memberSignatures.value: public Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema BuildSchema (Type type, System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary<Type,Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema BuildSchema(class System.Type type, class System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache) cil managed

parameters.name: type
parameters.summary: The type to build a schema for.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
An optional schema cache. The cache can be used to provide schemas for certain types,
            and it will also be populated as the schema is built.

returns.summary: A schema that matches the type.
